PV.content:

Paragraph: Polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM show a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V and a power conversion efficiency of 4.6% without any post-treatment.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

The power conversion efficiency of 4.6% is not a material property, but rather a performance metric of the device, so it is not relevant in this context.

The entity "0.94 V" refers to the open-circuit voltage of the polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM.
